abstract: Molycorp, a mine operator, acquires Neo Material for $1.3 billion, in the latest deal in a consolidating industry.
snippet: Molycorp, a mine operator, acquires Neo Material for $1.3 billion, in the latest deal in a consolidating industry.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG — One of the West’s two main rare earth metal mining companies announced on Friday that it was buying one of the world’s two main rare earth processing companies for $1.3 billion, the latest in a series of deals that are rapidly consolidating the industry.

headline.main: Molycorp, a Rare Earth Mining Firm, Is to Merge With a Processor, Neo Material
headline.print_headline: Molycorp, a Rare Earth Mining Firm, Is to Merge With a Processor, Neo Material
